attributes.action: ABOLISH THE USE OF PRIVATE BAILIFF FIRMS BY ALL COUNCILS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please stop the harrasement of private bailiff and enforcement companies and set up internal collections departments so people will have a chance to pay what they owe to local government for council tax and parking fines etc....
last year 2 parking violations costing 30.00 each have turned into 1500 pounds of debt .council tax bills double and causes families to break up under the pressure.
stop this awful rip off now and set up a government collections department which allows us to pay any outstanding accounts with our means tested .
some of the collection companies payment plans are "we need it all in 7 days"NO affordable solution is ever reached it is not a case of wont pay its a case of impossibility and greed.
